title: Build Pokecoin tracking app with shiny female Pokemon finder

requirements.text: Create a Pokecoin balance tracking system that allows users to log and view their current Pokecoin balance from Pokemon Go
acceptanceCriteria: Users can input their current Pokecoin balance
Users can view their Pokecoin balance history
Balance updates are persisted in the backend

requirements.text: Implement a shiny female Pokemon tracker where users can log and search for shiny female Pokemon they've encountered or are seeking
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add shiny female Pokemon to their collection with species name
Users can view a list of all tracked shiny female Pokemon
Each Pokemon entry includes species identification
Users can mark Pokemon as found or desired

requirements.text: Create a payout management system where users can track and manage Google Play payout amounts associated with their Pokecoin earnings
acceptanceCriteria: Users can record payout amounts in their local currency
Users can view payout history and totals
Payout records are linked to Pokecoin transactions
Users can see cumulative payout totals

requirements.text: Design a cohesive Pokemon-themed visual interface with vibrant colors, playful typography, and card-based layouts that reflect the Pokemon universe aesthetic while maintaining clean usability
acceptanceCriteria: UI uses a Pokemon-inspired color palette with vibrant accent colors
Layout uses card-based components for Pokemon and transaction displays
Overall design feels cohesive and game-like

constraints: This app tracks user data locally and does not integrate with actual Pokemon Go APIs or services
Google Play payouts are tracked as records only; no actual payment processing integration is included
Pokemon data is user-entered; no automated Pokemon Go data sync
nonGoals: Direct integration with Pokemon Go game servers or APIs
Actual Google Play payment processing or API integration
Real-time Pokemon location tracking or GPS features

required: Stylized Pokecoin icon illustration with metallic gold texture (pokecoin-icon.dim_256x256.png)
Shiny sparkle effect icon in pink and gold gradient (shiny-sparkle.dim_128x128.png)
Google Play payout badge icon in green and white (payout-badge.dim_128x128.png)
